headline: Will T-Mobile US' (TMUS) CEO Succession Drive the Next Phase of Digital Transformation?
summary: Earlier this month, T-Mobile US announced that Chief Operating Officer Srini Gopalan will become Chief Executive Officer starting November 1, 2025, with current CEO Mike Sievert moving to the newly created role of Vice Chairman to support long-term strategy and leadership continuity. This shift highlights the company’s longstanding succession plans and underscores T-Mobile’s focus on maintaining customer-centric growth by integrating technology innovation and operational expertise at the...
